channel.title: Very Important, 'ERROR WRITING FILE' [DELTA] CO-OWNER POSITION FOR HELP!
channel.description:
I'm running a DELTA server. I've never had this problem until now.
Any person who logs on to my server it will not save their file.
The command window says 'Error Writing File'
When a new player logs on it says, "Character File not found" - Thats standard.
However, it's supposed to save the file but won't. It gives me "Error Writing File"
When an Old Player logs on it will load them but will not save, it says, "Error Writing File"
I've never had this problem before and i've been running my server for over 2 months.
Please help I am offering a Co-Owner position on my server for the answer to this problem.
Thank you,
JGX

item.title: Very Important, 'ERROR WRITING FILE' [DELTA] CO-OWNER POSITION FOR HELP!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Look to see if the directory for saving the character files is correct. You may be missing the Charaters folder. I don’t know much about Delta but it is common sense.

Read full topic
item.source: Very Important, 'ERROR WRITING FILE' [DELTA] CO-OWNER POSITION FOR HELP!
